citations.narrative:
The majority of the APHIS 7006 forms did not list the method of transportation of the carrier, intermediate handler, or
name of the person who transported the dog or puppy. Failure to record the method of transportation makes it difficult to
know if the buyer, seller, or commercial shipper transported the puppy or puppies. Correct by recording the method of
transportation on APHIS form 7006, including the name of the carrier, intermediate handler, or owner's name if a privately
owned vehicle was used to transport the dog or puppy. Correct by October 5, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1)(viii) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The majority of the APHIS 7006 forms did not list the method of transportation of the carrier, intermediate handler, or 
name of the person who transported the dog or puppy. Failure to record the method of transportation makes it difficult to 
know if the buyer, seller, or commercial shipper transported the puppy or puppies. Correct by recording the method of 
transportation on APHIS form 7006, including the name of the carrier, intermediate handler, or owner's name if a privately 
owned vehicle was used to transport the dog or puppy. Correct by October 5, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
